column4: Are there any people here that're using Intrepid with a notebook with the Geforce series 9M video card?
Reason I ask is because of the annoying black tty's 1 through 6
Uninstalling nvidia driver gives back tty functionality
bugs.ubuntu.com should have a bug about that
are you also referring to this bug? https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/initramfs-tools/+bug/129910
nothing. lsmod does show up fbcon and vesafb as loaded
did you try the suggestions at the end regarding using uvesafb instead of vesafb?
yup I did. I'm beginning to wonder if specific videocards are bugged by this
In my case, I had the issue in gutsy and never again since then
&& scunizi, I've managed to fix the issue
what did you end up doing?
well was something stupid on my part. vesafb kept being loaded, but I forgot to remove the module from /lib/modules/`uname -r`/initrd and place uvesafb module there
uvesafb was loaded but from dmesg I got that it couldn't reserve video memory, so vesafb kept overriding it
